promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic monkey electric-type pokemon wearing lightning-charged bracers. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltazor, a a gigantic basic monkey electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Electric Ball, Bubble Beat. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "electric" or "Voltazor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, monkey-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Leviathan of storms, Voltazor generates power from lightning-charged habitats. With "Electric Ball" and "Bubble Beat", it enlivens the tempestuous forest.
